description: The denormalized manifest for tool submission.

Component.description: Category of metadata (e.g. Tools, Publications, etc.); provide the same one for all items/rows.
Component.title: Component

DatasetViewKey.description: Unique DatasetView_id foreign key(s) that link metadata entries as part of the same collection. Please provide multiple values as a comma-separated list.
DatasetViewKey.title: DatasetView Key

GrantViewKey.description: Unique GrantView_id foreign key(s) that group the resource with other components, as part of the same grant-associated collection. Please provide multiple values as a comma-separated list.
GrantViewKey.title: GrantView Key

PublicationViewKey.description: Unique PublicationView_id foreign key(s) that link metadata entries as part of the same collection. Please provide multiple values as a comma-separated list.
PublicationViewKey.title: PublicationView Key

StudyKey.description: The unique Study_id foreign keys associated with the resource, found in the grant Study information. Used to group the resource with other components. Please provide multiple values as a comma-separated list.
StudyKey.title: Study Key

ToolAccessibility.description: Whether there are non-monetary restrictions on accessing an online service.
ToolAccessibility.title: Tool Accessibility

ToolCmd.description: Relevant command, command-line fragment, or option for executing this function/running the tool in this mode.
ToolCmd.title: Tool Cmd

ToolComputeRequirements.description: Component dependency requirements for application. This includes runtime environments and shared libraries that are not included in the application distribution package, but required to run the application (examples: DirectX, Java or .NET runtime).
ToolComputeRequirements.title: Tool Compute Requirements

ToolCost.description: Monetary cost of acquiring the software.
ToolCost.title: Tool Cost

ToolDateLastModified.description: The date indicating when the tool's entry was most recently modified or updated, providing a timestamp of the latest changes made to the tool's information.
ToolDateLastModified.title: Tool Date Last Modified

ToolDocumentationType.description: Type of documentation that is linked to. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
ToolDocumentationType.title: Tool Documentation Type

ToolDocumentationUrl.description: Link to documentation on the web for the tool.
ToolDocumentationUrl.title: Tool Documentation Url

ToolDoi.description: The Digital Object Identifier (DOI) associated with the computational tool.
ToolDoi.title: Tool Doi

ToolDownloadType.description: The type of data, information, or system that is obtained when the link is resolved.
ToolDownloadType.title: Tool Download Type

ToolDownloadUrl.description: Link to download (or repo providing a download) for the software.
ToolDownloadUrl.title: Tool Download Url

ToolDownloadVersion.description: Version information (typically a version number) of the software applicable to this download.
ToolDownloadVersion.title: Tool Download Version

ToolEntityName.description: Name of the entities that may be credited
ToolEntityName.title: Tool Entity Name

ToolEntityRole.description: Role performed by entity that is credited, e.g. “Developer”
ToolEntityRole.title: Tool Entity Role

ToolEntityType.description: Types of entities that may be credited, e.g. ‘Person’.
ToolEntityType.title: Tool Entity Type

ToolFunctionNote.description: Concise comment about this function, if not apparent from the software description and EDAM annotations.
ToolFunctionNote.title: Tool Function Note

ToolHomepage.description: Homepage of the software, or some URL that best serves this purpose.
ToolHomepage.title: Tool Homepage

ToolInputData.description: Type of primary input data. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
ToolInputData.title: Tool Input Data

ToolInputFormat.description: Allowed format(s) of the input data. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
ToolInputFormat.title: Tool Input Format

ToolLanguage.description: Name of programming language the software source code was written in. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
ToolLanguage.title: Tool Language

ToolLicense.description: Software or data usage license. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
ToolLicense.title: Tool License

ToolLinkType.description: The type of data, information or system that is obtained when the link is resolved. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
ToolLinkType.title: Tool Link Type

ToolLinkUrl.description: A link of some relevance to the software (URL).
ToolLinkUrl.title: Tool Link Url

ToolName.description: Canonical tool name provided by the tool developer or service provider.
ToolName.title: Tool Name

ToolOperatingSystem.description: The operating system supported by a downloadable software package. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
ToolOperatingSystem.title: Tool Operating System

ToolOperation.description: The basic operation(s) performed by this software function. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
ToolOperation.title: Tool Operation

ToolOutputData.description: Type of primary output data. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
ToolOutputData.title: Tool Output Data

ToolOutputFormat.description: Allowed format(s) of the output data. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
ToolOutputFormat.title: Tool Output Format

ToolPackageDependencies.description: Specifies the software libraries, frameworks, or other components that a tool or package relies on for its proper functioning. This attribute helps users understand the prerequisites needed for installation and usage of the tool within a given computational environment
ToolPackageDependencies.title: Tool Package Dependencies

ToolPackageDependenciesPresent.description: Indicates whether the required package dependencies for tool are present.
ToolPackageDependenciesPresent.title: Tool Package Dependencies Present

ToolReleaseDate.description: The release date of a product or product model. This can be used to distinguish the exact variant of a product.
ToolReleaseDate.title: Tool Release Date

ToolTopic.description: General scientific domain the software serves, or other general category. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
ToolTopic.title: Tool Topic

ToolType.description: A type of application software: a discrete software entity can have more than one type. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
ToolType.title: Tool Type

ToolVersion.description: Version information (typically a version number) of the software applicable to this entry.
ToolVersion.title: Tool Version

ToolViewId.description: A unique primary key that enables record updates using schematic.
ToolViewId.title: ToolView_id

title: ToolView_validation
